Articles.Content:
Hello, I found out about this game on the X-Rebirth forums, and this thing is amazing..., i have been playing for a few days now and my space progam has had a good number casualties (poor brave revivable bob bill and jebediah, i\'m still fooling around to get a kerbin orbit.. let alone the mun !

my best try yet is kirbinic IV .. a 38 solid fuel/ 1 liquid fuel rocket 3 stage cruise missile.. i got to 138000 m at around 1400m/s..

ps, this game ROCKS
Welcome to the forums. All you need to orbit is 3 tanks and an engine. This is my tutorial if you want to check it out:

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
i\'ll fool around a little bit longer and see if i can orbit by myself before a tutorial.. 3 tanks and an engine.. thats light .. sooo light compared to the designs i made just to get to 20 000 m XD
Use the map, M on your keyboard, it shows trajectories and such, really useful for getting a good orbit going

And Deathtrap NÂ°8 has achieved elliptic orbit!!! and so i say farewell to bill and krew for their sacrifice to the alt tab black screen, forever lost in darkness.. Ok who wants to be a Kerbonaut ?

A great thanks to you all and ivans guide telling me that pointing up all the way, does not make you orbit..

and we have orbit (yeah, you saw the name right.. Jeb hijacked it.. unfortunatly for him his first orbit will be his last until the rescue mission takes effect):
